Brief Information: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Gorakhpur has given a Notification for the Recruitment of Senior Resident Vacancy. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply.

All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Gorakhpur

Advt No. AIIMS/GKP/RECT/SR/2024-25/48

Senior Resident Vacancy 2024

WWW.FREEJOBALERT.COM

Download Mobile App

Application Fee

  • For UR, EWS and OBC Category: Rs. 1,180/- (Including GST) 
  • For SC/ST and Women/PwD Category: NiL
  • Payment Mode: Demand Draft or in the form of NEFT

Important Dates

  • Date of Notification: 27-09-2024
  • Last Date for Receipt of application: 01-11-2024
  • Date of Interview: Will be updated on institute website

Age Limit

  • Upper Age Limit: 45 Years
  • Age Relaxation is Applicable As Per Rules.

Qualification

  • Candidates Should Possess postgraduate degree i.e. MD/MS/DNB/MDS in the specialty concerned or its equivalent.
  • For Non-Medical candidates MSc. in the concerned subject and Ph. D. from a recognized university
  • For the Department of Pathology, the essential qualification shall be MD pathology/MD Lab Medicine
  • Must be registered with the Central/State Medical Council.
  • For More Details Refer Notification.

Maharashtra.contentHtml:
Name of the Post: AIIMS, Gorakhpur Senior Resident Offline Form 2024

Post Date: 04-10-2024

Total Vacancy: 144

Brief Information: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Gorakhpur has given a Notification for the Recruitment of Senior Resident Vacancy. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply.

All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Gorakhpur

Advt No. AIIMS/GKP/RECT/SR/2024-25/48

Senior Resident Vacancy 2024

WWW.FREEJOBALERT.COM

Download Mobile App

Application Fee

  • For UR, EWS and OBC Category: Rs. 1,180/- (Including GST) 
  • For SC/ST and Women/PwD Category: NiL
  • Payment Mode: Demand Draft or in the form of NEFT

Important Dates

  • Date of Notification: 27-09-2024
  • Last Date for Receipt of application: 01-11-2024
  • Date of Interview: Will be updated on institute website

Age Limit

  • Upper Age Limit: 45 Years
  • Age Relaxation is Applicable As Per Rules.

Qualification

  • Candidates Should Possess postgraduate degree i.e. MD/MS/DNB/MDS in the specialty concerned or its equivalent.
  • For Non-Medical candidates MSc. in the concerned subject and Ph. D. from a recognized university
  • For the Department of Pathology, the essential qualification shall be MD pathology/MD Lab Medicine
